00089 wxBlokus::~wxBlokus()

00095 void wxBlokus::RefreshTilePanels()
00096 {
00097       PrevTilePanel->setTeam(game->getCurrentPlayer()->getTeam());
00098       PrevTilePanel->setTile(game->getCurrentPlayer()->getPreviousTile());
00099       PrevTilePanel->Refresh();
00100 
00101       CurrentTilePanel->setTeam(game->getCurrentPlayer()->getTeam());
00102       CurrentTilePanel->setTile(game->getCurrentPlayer()->getCurrentTile());
00103       CurrentTilePanel->Refresh();
00104 
00105       NextTilePanel->setTeam(game->getCurrentPlayer()->getTeam());
00106       NextTilePanel->setTile(game->getCurrentPlayer()->getNextTile());
00107       NextTilePanel->Refresh();
00108 }
00109 
00110 void wxBlokus::OnSkip(wxCommandEvent &event)
00111 {
00112       game->CyclePlayers();
00113 
00114       RefreshTilePanels();
00115 
00116       BlokusFieldPanel->Refresh();
00117 }
00118 
00119 void wxBlokus::OnNew(wxCommandEvent &event)
00120 {
00121       delete game;
00122       game = new Game(rules, &GameEnd);
00123 
00124       BlokusFieldPanel->setGame(game);
00125 
00126       BlokusFieldPanel->Refresh();
00127 
00128       RefreshTilePanels();
00129 
00130       BlokusFieldPanel->setTileX(0);
00131       BlokusFieldPanel->setTileY(0);
00132 
00133       Refresh();
00134 }

00136 void wxBlokus::ShowScore()
00137 {
00138       wxString s;
00139 
00140       s << wxT("Score, lower is better.\n\n");
00141       for(u8 playerIndex = 0; playerIndex < game->getPlayerCount(); ++playerIndex)
00142       {
00143             s << wxT("Player ") << (playerIndex + 1) << wxT(": ");
00144 
00145             u16 score = game->getPlayer(playerIndex)->getScore();
00146 
00147             if(score == 0)
00148                   s << wxT("WIN");
00149             else
00150                   s << score;
00151             s << wxT("\n\n");
00152       }
00153       wxMessageBox(s, wxT("Score"), wxOK, this);
00154 }
00155 
00156 void wxBlokus::OnCountScore(wxCommandEvent &event)
00157 {
00158       ShowScore();
00159 }

00161 void wxBlokus::OnGameEnd()
00162 {
00163       ShowScore();

00171 void wxBlokus::OnAbout(wxCommandEvent &event)
00172 {
00173       wxMessageBox(wxT(
00174 "Blokus\n\n\
00175 Up,Down,Left,Right: Move tile\n\n\
00176 Shift+Up,Down: Cycle tiles\n\
00177 Shift+Left,Right: Rorate tile\n\n\
00178 Ctrl+Up,Down,Left,Right: Flip tile"), wxT("About Blokus"), wxOK, this);
00179 }

00181 void wxBlokus::OnLoad(wxCommandEvent &event)
00182 {
00183       //wxStandardPaths::GetUserConfigDir();
00184       wxFileName dir = wxFileName::DirName(wxGetCwd());
00185       dir.AppendDir(wxT("saves"));
00186       wxString filename = wxFileSelector(wxT("Load state"), dir.GetPath(),wxT(""),
00187       wxT(".bls"), wxT("Blokus savefiles (*.bls)|*.bls"), wxOPEN | wxFD_FILE_MUST_EXIST);
00188       if(filename.empty())
00189             return;
00190       game->LoadGame(filename.mb_str());
00191       //wxMessageBox(wxT("Load failed D:"), wxT("Errorish"), wxOK | wxICON_ERROR, this);
00192 
00193       RefreshTilePanels();
00194 
00195       Refresh();
00196 }
00197 
00198 void wxBlokus::OnSave(wxCommandEvent &event)
00199 {
00200       wxFileName dir = wxFileName::DirName(wxGetCwd());
00201       dir.AppendDir(wxT("saves"));
00202       wxString filename = wxFileSelector(wxT("Save state"), dir.GetPath(), wxT(""),
00203       wxT(".bls"), wxT("Blokus savefiles (*.bls)|*.bls"), wxSAVE);
00204       if(filename.empty())
00205             return;
00206       game->SaveGame(filename.mb_str());
00207       //wxMessageBox(wxT("Not implemented."), wxT("Errorish"), wxOK | wxICON_ERROR, this);
00208 }
00209 
00210 void wxBlokus::KeyDown(wxKeyEvent &event)
00211 {
00212       bool updateTiles = false;
00213       switch(event.GetKeyCode())
00214       {
00215             case WXK_LEFT:
00216                   if(event.ShiftDown())
00217                   {
00218                         TileRotateLeft(game->getCurrentPlayer()->getCurrentTile()->getTileData());
00219 
00220                         updateTiles = true;
00221                         break;
00222                   }
00223                   if(event.ControlDown())
00224                   {
00225                         TileFlipHorizontal(game->getCurrentPlayer()->getCurrentTile()->getTileData());
00226 
00227                         updateTiles = true;
00228                         break;
00229                   }
00230                   if(BlokusFieldPanel->getTileX() == 0)
00231                         break;
00232                   BlokusFieldPanel->setTileX(BlokusFieldPanel->getTileX()-1);
00233                   break;
00234             case WXK_RIGHT:
00235                   if(event.ShiftDown())
00236                   {
00237                         TileRotateRight(game->getCurrentPlayer()->getCurrentTile()->getTileData());
00238 
00239                         updateTiles = true;
00240                         break;
00241                   }
00242                   if(event.ControlDown())
00243                   {
00244                         TileFlipHorizontal(game->getCurrentPlayer()->getCurrentTile()->getTileData());
00245 
00246                         updateTiles = true;
00247                         break;
00248                   }
00249                   if(BlokusFieldPanel->getTileX() == game->getField()->Width-game->getCurrentPlayer()->getCurrentTile()->getTileData()->Width)
00250                         break;
00251                   BlokusFieldPanel->setTileX(BlokusFieldPanel->getTileX()+1);
00252                   break;
00253             case WXK_UP:
00254                   if(event.ShiftDown())
00255                   {
00256                         game->getCurrentPlayer()->setPreviousTile();
00257 
00258                         updateTiles = true;
00259                         break;
00260                   }
00261                   if(event.ControlDown())
00262                   {
00263                         TileFlipVertical(game->getCurrentPlayer()->getCurrentTile()->getTileData());
00264 
00265                         updateTiles = true;
00266                         break;
00267                   }
00268 
00269                   if(BlokusFieldPanel->getTileY() == 0)
00270                         break;
00271                   BlokusFieldPanel->setTileY(BlokusFieldPanel->getTileY()-1);
00272                   break;
00273             case WXK_DOWN:
00274                   if(event.ShiftDown())
00275                   {
00276                         game->getCurrentPlayer()->setNextTile();
00277 
00278                         updateTiles = true;
00279                         break;
00280                   }
00281                   if(event.ControlDown())
00282                   {
00283                         TileFlipVertical(game->getCurrentPlayer()->getCurrentTile()->getTileData());
00284 
00285                         updateTiles = true;
00286                         break;
00287                   }
00288                   if(BlokusFieldPanel->getTileY() == game->getField()->Width-game->getCurrentPlayer()->getCurrentTile()->getTileData()->Height)
00289                         break;
00290                   BlokusFieldPanel->setTileY(BlokusFieldPanel->getTileY()+1);
00291                   break;
00292             case WXK_RETURN:
00293                   game->PlaceTile(game->getCurrentPlayer()->getCurrentTile(), BlokusFieldPanel->getTileX(), BlokusFieldPanel->getTileY());
00294                   updateTiles = true;
00295                   break;
00296             default:
00297                   break;
00298       }
00299 
00300       BlokusFieldPanel->Refresh();
00301 
00302       if(updateTiles)
00303       {
00304             if(BlokusFieldPanel->getTileX() > game->getField()->Width-game->getCurrentPlayer()->getCurrentTile()->getTileData()->Width)
00305                   BlokusFieldPanel->setTileX(game->getField()->Width-game->getCurrentPlayer()->getCurrentTile()->getTileData()->Width);
00306 
00307             if(BlokusFieldPanel->getTileY() > game->getField()->Width-game->getCurrentPlayer()->getCurrentTile()->getTileData()->Height)
00308                   BlokusFieldPanel->setTileY(game->getField()->Width-game->getCurrentPlayer()->getCurrentTile()->getTileData()->Height);
00309 
00310             RefreshTilePanels();
00311       }
00312 }
